results.adx_keywords: Water;Skeletons;DNA (Deoxyribonucleic Acid);Global Warming;Forensic Science;Boats and Boating;Lake Mead
results.title: Authorities Identify Remains Found at Lake Mead
results.abstract: Two decades ago, a man vanished in the water in front of his children. This week, their DNA samples helped to identify his remains, among several discovered recently amid a drought.

media.caption: A decomposing barrel along the shores of Lake Mead, near the spot where a victim who appeared to die from a gunshot wound was discovered in another barrel.
media.copyright: Joe Buglewicz for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Drugs (Pharmaceuticals);Coronavirus (2019-nCoV);Inventions and Patents;Suits and Litigation (Civil);Vaccination and Immunization;Bancel, Stephane;BioNTech SE;Moderna Inc;Pfizer Inc;Germany;Massachusetts
results.byline: By Rebecca Robbins and Jenny Gross
results.title: Moderna Sues Pfizer and BioNTech Over Covid Vaccine Technology
results.abstract: Two lawsuits filed in Massachusetts and Germany claim the Pfizer-BioNTech Covid-19 vaccine violated Moderna’s mRNA patents.

media.caption: Moderna said Pfizer and BioNTech had infringed on patents filed between 2010 and 2016.

results.adx_keywords: Computers and the Internet;News and News Media;Libel and Slander;Compensation for Damages (Law);Presidential Election of 2020;Suits and Litigation (Civil);Rumors and Misinformation;Conspiracy Theories;First Amendment (US Constitution);Television;Carlson, Tucker;Dobbs, Lou;Hannity, Sean;Murdoch, Lachlan;Fox News Channel
results.title: Sean Hannity and Other Fox Stars Face Depositions in Defamation Suit
results.abstract: The depositions are one of the clearest indications yet of how aggressively Dominion Voting Systems is moving forward with its suit against the media company.

media.caption: Sean Hannity is the latest Fox News star to be called for a deposition by Dominion Voting Systems’ legal team.
media.copyright: Emil Lippe for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Classified Information and State Secrets;Search and Seizure;United States Politics and Government;Decisions and Verdicts;Trump, Donald J;Garland, Merrick B;Reinhart, Bruce E;Mar-a-Lago (Palm Beach, Fla);Federal Bureau of Investigation;Justice Department
results.byline: By Glenn Thrush and Alan Feuer
results.title: Judge Orders Redacted Affidavit Used in Trump Search Warrant to Be Unsealed
results.abstract: The document will be unsealed by noon Friday. In its most complete form, it would disclose important details about the government’s justification for searching Mar-a-Lago this month.

media.caption: The F.B.I. searched former President Donald J. Trump’s Mar-a-Lago estate as part of an investigation into whether he took classified records from the White House to his Florida residence.

results.adx_keywords: Dietary Supplements and Herbal Remedies;Deaths (Fatalities);McClintock, Lori (d 2021);McClintock, Thomas M (1956- );Food and Drug Administration
results.title: Death of Rep. Tom McClintock’s Wife Tied to White Mulberry Leaf
results.abstract: The Sacramento County Coroner’s Office said Lori McClintock died in December 2021 of dehydration caused by stomach inflammation from consuming the herbal remedy.

media.caption: Lori McClintock with her husband, Tom, in 2003, when he was running for governor of California. She died in December.

results.adx_keywords: Firearms;Gun Control;Second Amendment (US Constitution);Federal Courts (US);Trump, Donald J;Watts, Shannon;Fort Worth (Tex)
results.title: Judge Strikes Down Texas Law Barring Adults Under 21 From Carrying Handguns
results.abstract: The federal judge ruled that the Second Amendment, “as informed by Founding-era history and tradition,” did not exclude 18- to 20-year-olds from the right to carry handguns.

media.caption: U.S. District Judge Mark T. Pittman ordered the injunction stayed for 30 days, pending appeal, meaning that it would not immediately go into effect.
media.copyright: Callaghan O'Hare for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Suits and Litigation (Civil);Sex Crimes;Legal Profession;Child Abuse and Neglect;Human Trafficking;Prostitution;Borgerson, Scott;Epstein, Jeffrey E (1953- );Maxwell, Ghislaine;Haddon, Morgan and Foreman PC
results.title: Ghislaine Maxwell’s Own Lawyers Are Now Suing Her
results.abstract: The law firm Haddon, Morgan and Foreman has accused Ms. Maxwell and her brother of failing to pay nearly $900,000 in legal fees related to her sex abuse defense.

media.caption: Ghislaine Maxwell and her brother, Kevin Maxwell, grew up amid wealth, but her lawyers say they quit paying their legal bills last year.
media.copyright: Sylvain Gaboury/Patrick McMullan, via Getty Images

results.adx_keywords: Education (K-12);School Boards;School Shootings and Armed Attacks;Parkland, Fla, Shooting (2018);DeSantis, Ron;Broward County (Fla);Florida
results.title: DeSantis Suspends 4 Elected School Board Members After Report on Parkland
results.abstract: A grand jury report found the board members had engaged in “acts of incompetence and neglect of duty,” but an ousted member called the governor’s move “political retribution.”

media.caption: Gov. Ron DeSantis’s decision to suspend four Broward County school board members was not unexpected because of a grand jury recommendation.
media.copyright: Luis Santana/Tampa Bay Times, via Associated Press

results.title: Donald Trump Is Not Above the Law
results.abstract: Prosecuting a former president is an unprecedented but necessary step to protect American democracy.
org_facet: House Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack

results.adx_keywords: Newtown, Conn, Shooting (2012);Compensation for Damages (Law);Suits and Litigation (Civil);Frauds and Swindling;Libel and Slander;Jones, Alex (1974- );Infowars
results.title: Alex Jones Accused of Hiding Assets From Sandy Hook Families
results.abstract: The Infowars fabulist has been funneling millions out of his empire while claiming bankruptcy, the Sandy Hook families suing him say.

media.caption: Alex Jones has for years spread lies that the 2012 shooting that killed 20 first graders and six educators in Newtown, Conn., was staged by the government.

results.adx_keywords: Diaries;Presidential Election of 2020;United States Politics and Government;Decisions and Verdicts;Biden, Ashley (1981- );Biden, Joseph R Jr;Harris, Aimee (1982- );Kurlander, Robert (1963- );Project Veritas;Justice Department
results.byline: By Adam Goldman and Michael S. Schmidt
results.title: Florida Pair Pleads Guilty in Theft of Biden’s Daughter’s Diary
results.abstract: Aimee Harris and Robert Kurlander admitted to participating in a conspiracy in which Ashley Biden’s diary ended up in the hands of the conservative group Project Veritas near the end of the 2020 campaign.

media.caption: Robert Kurlander, left, with his lawyer, Jonathan Kaplan, on Thursday. In court papers filed in connection with Mr. Kurlander’s plea, prosecutors directly tied Project Veritas to the theft of Ashley Biden’s items.
media.copyright: Jefferson Siegel for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: United States Politics and Government;Student Loans;Computers and the Internet;Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act (2020);Social Media;Taxation;Republican Party;Twitter
results.title: White House Snaps Back at Twitter Critics of Student Loan Relief
results.abstract: In an aggressive turn, the normally staid @WhiteHouse account itemized hundreds of thousands of dollars in pandemic-related debt relief given to U.S. House members who criticized the Biden plan.
des_facet: Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act (2020)

media.caption: The White House Twitter account called out Republican members of Congress who tweeted criticism of President Biden’s student loan, noting that several had received government debt relief themselves.
media.copyright: Stefani Reynolds for The New York Times

results.title: Fighting Between U.S. and Iran-Backed Militias Escalates in Syria
results.abstract: Two strikes on U.S. military sites have been tied to forces aligned with Iran, raising tensions just as Washington appears close to striking a new nuclear deal with Tehran.
des_facet: United States Defense and Military Forces

media.caption: American forces patrolling in Syria’s northeastern Hasakeh Province in May.

results.title: We Knew the Justice Department Case Was Righteous. This Affidavit Confirms It.
results.abstract: The government doesn’t get to pick and choose which documents to defend based on politics.

results.adx_keywords: Search and Seizure;Classified Information and State Secrets;United States Politics and Government;Trump, Donald J;Republican Party;Justice Department;Mar-a-Lago (Palm Beach, Fla)
results.title: Republicans, Once Outraged by Mar-a-Lago Search, Become Quieter as Details Emerge
results.abstract: Some of former President Donald J. Trump’s most loyal allies were initially focused elsewhere — a potentially telling reaction with ramifications for his political future.

media.caption: From left, Eric Trump, Representative Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia, Tucker Carlson, Donald Trump Jr. and former President Donald J. Trump at his golf club in Bedminster, N.J., last month. The former president’s allies have been largely silent after the release of the affidavit.

results.title: Psilocybin Therapy Sharply Reduces Excessive Drinking, Small Study Shows
results.abstract: Researchers said the results offered promise to the millions of Americans with alcohol use disorder.
org_facet: New York University Langone Medical Center

media.caption: A psilocybin capsule used in a study, published Wednesday, that helped heavy drinkers cut back or quit entirely.

results.adx_keywords: Global Warming;Greenhouse Gas Emissions;Hazardous and Toxic Substances;PFAS (Per- and Polyfluoroalkyl Substances);Regulation and Deregulation of Industry;Water Pollution;Environmental Protection Agency
results.title: E.P.A. to Designate PFAS, or ‘Forever Chemicals,’ as Hazardous
results.abstract: A proposed rule would require companies to report spills of two toxic chemicals that have been linked to cancer.

media.caption: PFAS chemicals have been found in a range of products including carpets, waterproof clothing and food packaging, including some microwave popcorn bags.

results.byline: By Kate Golembiewski and François Brunelle
results.title: Your Doppelgänger Is Out There and You Probably Share DNA With Them
results.abstract: That person who looks just like you is not your twin, but if scientists compared your genomes, they might find a lot in common.

media.caption: Charlie Chasen and Michael Malone, Atlanta, 2014.

results.title: The Sale of a Product Responsible for Bloodshed and Fear Is Still Tied to Our Wildlife
results.abstract: Hunters are a small slice of gun buyers these days. But they benefit from a windfall from a tax on guns.
